Commands.Description: Tells GPT to refactor provided code
Commands.Prompt: Given the following code, refactor it to be more readable and maintainable. Please provide code documentation for all members in the code and comments where appropriate.

Commands.Description: Tells GPT to explain provided code
Commands.Prompt: Given the following code. First provide a general overview of what the code does. Then explain each line of code in detail. Focus on why the code is written the way not on what is does.

Commands.Description: Tells GPT to find a bug in provided code
Commands.Prompt: There is a bug in the following code. First explain all possible reasons for the bug in details. Next provide a solution.

Commands.Description: Tells GPT to create an email
Commands.Prompt: Create an email to a client explaining the following: 1. What is the purpose of the email? 2. What is the problem? 3. What is the solution? 4. What is the benefit to the client? 5. What is the next step? Base your input on provided information.

Commands.Description: Tells GPT to respond to an email
Commands.Prompt: Respond to the following email, providing a detailed response. Base your input on provided information.
